title: 10/27/21 DPS Hour 3 David Ortiz
itunes:title: 10/27/21 DPS Hour 3 David Ortiz
description:
David Ortiz tells Dan that he loves Tom Brady and that he would not take his career over Tom Brady's career. David tells Dan that he has a lot of memorabilia but just doesn't know where it all is.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
